EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_ModernizingNETApps_eBook_Q418.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Modernizing .NET Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the O'Reilly eBook Modernizing .NET Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/modernizing-net-applications]]>. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
